name: Aidan Special
author: deli
summary: Nice hearty sandwich, on a cold night, and a cup of soup. Great for anything. Very filling. My boys love them. Enjoy.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon butter, softened, or as needed
2 ounces turkey breast, or more to taste
2 slices cooked bacon, or more to taste
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium heat
Spread butter on 1 side of each bread piece and place, butter-side down, into the skillet
Place 2 slices Swiss cheese on each bread slice; cook until cheese melts, 3 to 4 minutes
Place turkey and tomato slices in a separate skillet over medium heat; cook until warmed, 2 to 3 minutes
Layer turkey, bacon, and tomato onto 1 bread slice that will be the bottom of the sandwich
Spread Russian dressing over tomato layer; top with second bread slice creating a sandwich
